org.apps8os.trafficsense.util

Class JourneyInfoResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apps8os.trafficsense.util.JourneyInfoResolver

  • public class JourneyInfoResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for retrieving more information on a journey. This includes GPS coordinates for Waypoints, and HSL transport type for Segments.
    See Also:
    http://developer.reittiopas.fi/pages/en/http-get-interface-version-2.php

    • Constructor Detail

      • JourneyInfoResolver

        public JourneyInfoResolver()
        Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • setLanguage

        public boolean setLanguage(int language)
        Set the desired language. Defaults to Constants.LANG_EN on error. This method is synchronized because changing the language in the middle of a series of API requests may result in mixed response sets.
        Parameters:
        language - language code (Constants.LANG_*)
        Returns:
        true on success.

      • retrieveCoordinatesFromHsl

        public void retrieveCoordinatesFromHsl(Route journey)
        Retrieve GPS coordinates via HSL API for all Waypoints whose stopCode is available. Others are ignored. Invokes thread-unsafe private methods which make HTTP requests. Thus, this method is also thread-unsafe and is synchronized.
        Parameters:
        journey - the journey for which GPS coordinates shall be retrieved.
        Throws:
        JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException

      • lookupSegmentTransportType

        private void lookupSegmentTransportType(Segment segment)
                                 throws JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException
        Query HSL API for the actual 'transport_type' of this segment. Walking(0), Metro(6), and Ferry(7) are determined by Segment.setSegmentType(). Makes HTTP request, not thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        segment - the segment.
        Throws:
        JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException

      • lookupWaypointCoordinate

        private void lookupWaypointCoordinate(Waypoint waypoint)
                               throws JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException
        Query HSL API for the GPS coordinate of a given Waypoint. Do nothing if stopCode is unavailable. Makes HTTP request, not thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        waypoint - waypoint to query for
        Throws:
        JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException

      • doHttpGetRequest

        private java.lang.String doHttpGetRequest(java.lang.String url)
                                   throws JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException
        Make an HTTP GET request. Uses shared HttpClient instance and thus not thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        url - url to GET.
        Returns:
        response body. empty on error.
        Throws:
        JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException

      • buildGetLineInfoUrl

        private java.lang.String buildGetLineInfoUrl(java.lang.String responseLimit,
                                   java.lang.String query)
        Builds the URL to query HSL API for Line information.
        Parameters:
        responseLimit - response field filter.
        query - search key.
        Returns:
        the URL.

      • buildGetStopInfoUrl

        private java.lang.String buildGetStopInfoUrl(java.lang.String responseLimit,
                                   java.lang.String stopCode)
        Builds the URL to query HSL API for Stop information.
        Parameters:
        responseLimit - response field filter.
        stopCode - stopCode.
        Returns:
        the URL.

      • buildGetGeocodingUrl

        private java.lang.String buildGetGeocodingUrl(java.lang.String responseLimit,
                                    java.lang.String locType,
                                    java.lang.String key)
                                       throws JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException
        Builds the URL to query HSL API for Geocoding. Does not support specifying certain city(ies) in HSL region.
        Parameters:
        responseLimit - response field filter.
        locType - location type. default: stop|address
        key - search key.
        Returns:
        the URL.
        Throws:
        JourneyInfoResolver.JourneyInfoResolverException - on encoding errors.
